text: int main ( ) { int t , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int sum = 0 ; long long n , test [ 100000 ] = { 1 } ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long long arr [ 100000 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i - 1 ] < arr [ i ] ) { test [ i ] = test [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; } else { test [ i ] = 1 ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum = sum + test [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
